title: calendar notices and warnings
body:
calendars were working fine on my owncloud 4.5.1 installation. then, i accidentally enabled the webdevauth app, which resulted in an error on every page access:

fatal error: declaration of oc_user_webdavauth::deleteuser() must be compatible with that of oc_user_interface::deleteuser() in/apps/user_webdavauth/user_webdavauth.php on line 83

i edited the database by hand, changing oc_appconfig.user_webdavauth from 'yes' to 'no', restoring access to owncloud.

now, however, on accessing the calendar app, i see three notices and six warnings on each page access:

notice: undefined index: id in /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 94

notice: undefined index: userid in /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 95

notice: undefined index: active in /apps/calendar/index.php on line 20

warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php:94) in /lib/template.php on line 164

warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php:94) in /lib/template.php on line 165

warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php:94) in /lib/template.php on line 166

warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php:94) in /lib/template.php on line 164

warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php:94) in /lib/template.php on line 165

warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php:94) in /lib/template.php on line 166 

any idea how to eliminate these?
